name: Stickybear Typing
overview: "Stickybear Typing" is a 1985 educational program by Richard Hefter and Susan Dubicki, and distributed by Optimum Resource, Inc, based on Richard Hefter's Stickybear character. Appropriate for young players, beginners, and anyone seeking to review the keyboard, home key position, and each of the keys in turn; the lessons are structured toward enabling mastery of the entire keyboard in 30 levels;
